title: Ghibli ga Ippai SPECIAL Short Short 1992 - 2016
original_name: ジブリがいっぱい SPECIAL ショート ショート
sinopse: A DVD release with a collection of commercials and TV spots produced by Studio Ghibli or its subsidiary Studio Kajino between the years 2000 and 2005.In total, the collection clocks in at a runtime of 51 minutes.
